src:
An Illustrator Captures Cozy Moments Between Couples So Well We Can Feel the Love

06 Nov 2019, 03:30

Luong Thuy, an artist from Vietnam, draws cute comic strips that show the funny everyday interactions between loving couples. Her comic strips are so relatable that there’s something in there for everyone.
Bright Side cherishes the joy that comes with the light-hearted interactions with your loved ones. And we are sure that the comic strips below will remind you of them and make you smile.
